title: Salem Maritime National Historic Site: News Releases
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases               News Releases           Subscribe  | What is RSS     December 22, 2015  First Day Hike  This New Year’s Day the National Park Service and the City of Salem invite local residents to participate in First Day Hike, a national initiative established by America’s State Parks and supported by Salem Mayor Kimberley Driscoll and National Park Service Superintendent Paul DePrey.   October 21, 2015  Park Announces New Seasonal Hours of Operation and New Programs at the Salem Regional Visitor Center  The National Park Service is announcing a seasonal change to the hours of operation for the  Salem Regional Visitor Center (2 New Liberty St.) effective November 2.  The Visitor Center will now be open Wednesday through Sunday, 10am-5pm beginning on November 2.   September 03, 2015  Park to Enhance Harbor View, Safety and Public Programming on Historic Waterfront  This fall the National Park Service will begin three separate projects to enhance the visitor experience along historic Derby and Central Wharves at Salem Maritime National Historic Site.
